title: Field Remedy: 2513
subject: Alternator - Defect
complaint:
Battery discharged and/or alternator control
indicator illuminates.

remedyContent.text:
Note: Before replacing alternator the following check has to be 
      carried out.

In case of customer complaint the alternator has to be checked
according TIS2Web service instruction e.g. Model Corsa-D, Astra-H.

Use group J Engine and Engine Aggregates->
 Engine Electrics->
 
Alternator->
 Repair Instruction->
 Test battery/alternator.
